Sorie has been a professional teacher for 39 years now. He has requested this loan to buy home-building materials – iron corrugated sheets, cement, etc. -- for the construction of a family dwelling.

loans.use: to buy home-building materials – iron corrugated sheets, cement, etc. -- for the construction of a family dwelling.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
EL SEÑOR FELIX MAS QUE PREOCUPARSE POR SU FAMILIA ES UN HOMBRE TRABAJADOR EL TRABAJA LOS 7 DIAS DE LA SEMANA SU TURNO COMPLETO.
FELIX SIEMPRE VE POR LA MEJORA DE SUS HIJOS YA QUE LA ESPOSA LOS ABANDONO Y EL TIENE QE TRABAJAR MUCHO PARA QUE NO LE FALTE NADA A ELLOS. EL PROYECTO ES TERMINAR DE COMPRAR UN TERRENO  Y EMPEZAR A CONSTRUIR UN PATRIMONIO EL CUAL HEREDAR A SUS HIJOS EN UN FUTURO.
ESPERA QUE LO PODAMOS AYUDAR ES POR ESO QUE ACUDIO A NOSOTROS.
texts.en:
Felix doesn't just take care of his family.  He is a hard-working man who works seven days a week, full time.

Felix is always looking out for his children as his wife abandoned them and he has to work hard so that they don't want for anything.  His project is to finish buying a plot of land and start building an estate that he can leave his children as a future inheritance.

Felix hopes that we can help him.  This is why he came to us.

loans.use: To pay for a plot of land in order to build it up for his family

loans.name: Tepatasi

texts.en: Tepatasi is 26 years old and married with 3 children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To get her business started, she needs a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, baking powder, dripping oil, and a new frying pan.  Tepatasi hopes to expand her business in the future. She joined SPBD, a Kiva partner, in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, dripping oil, and a new frying pan to start a pancake business

loans.name: Galdina

texts.es:
La señora Galdina y su eposo viven solos, sus hijos ya hicieron sus vidas de casados. Ella es dueña del negocio de transporte de mercancia desde hace ya diez años, invirtio y compro un trailer el cual maneja su esposo, con el servicio que ella presta solventan sus gastos a la perfección. El trailer es un medio de transporte que necesita de mucho mantenimiento y ella le piensa comprar neumaticos nuevos y mantenimiento general. 
Ella quiere proteger a su esposo en carretera y estar tranquila sabiendo que el transporte le brinda seguridad en cuanto fallas mecanicas y asi poder seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Galdina and her husband live alone; their children already have their married lives.  She has been the owner of a merchandise transport company for 10 years. Galdina invested in her business by buying her husband a trailer. She has always resolved her debts perfectly and quickly.  The new trailer is used for their business and needs new tires and general maintenance.

She wants to protect her husband on the highway and have the peace of mind of knowing that his means of transportation is safe with regard to mechanical failures and therefore be able to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy tires and to pay for general maintenance.

loans.name: Gerardo Antonio

texts.es: Gerardo  es una persona  trabajadora   que  día con día  se esfuerza  por   sacar adelante a  su  familia  ya  que  es lo mas importante  en  su  vida, el se  dedica a la venta  de  comida  rápida  como  hamburguesas y hot  dogs, en  este  momento  requiere realizar la  compra  de  materia prima  para  poder  seguir trabajando, esta  muy  contento  de  habernos  encontrado  ya  que  gracias  al  apoyo  brindado  podrá  seguir  ofreciendo a  sus clientes el excelente  servicio  que  lo  a caracterizado  además  de   que hará  crecer  su   negocio  obteniendo  mayores  ingresos.
texts.en: Gerardo is a hardworking person who struggles day by day to provide for his family, which is the most important thing in his life. He works selling fast food, such as hamburgers and hot dogs. He currently needs to purchase raw materials in order to continue working. He is very happy to have found us because thanks to the support offered he will be able to continue offering his customers the excellent service for which he is known, and this will expand his business and increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for his food stall.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La señora Rosa María es una mujer emprendedora, desde hace 3 años Tiene su negocio que es la compra y venta de calzado pues siempre esta ofreciéndoles a sus clientes un buen servicio. Rosa María es una mujer muy trabajadora con ganas de salir adelante para ella la disciplina es el mejor secreto en el trabajo, porque le permite realizar sus metas en el futuro, ella solicita financiamiento para compra y venta de zapatos, de cuero y deportivos para niños y adultos.
texts.en: Rosa María has been an entrepreneur for three years. She buys and sells shoes and prides herself in offering shoppers excellent customer service. Rosa María is a hardworking woman who hopes to improve her life through her work. For her, discipline is the secret to success, because it allows her to achieve her goals for her future. She is requesting a loan to buy athletic and leather shoes for both children and adults.

loans.use: To buy shoes for her business.

loans.name: El Mirador De Cconchaccalla Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “El Mirador de Cconchaccalla” en la comunidad de Cconchaccalla del distrito de San Jeronimo de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas principal de los socios son la agricultura y ganadería, otros se dedican a la venta de comestibles,   a la venta de verduras, a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas y otros más.   

(La señora Nancy está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia Nancy  nació en la comunidad de Cconchaccalla y vive en la misma comunidad donde nació, ella tiene 30 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos. Su actividad económica principal de la Nancy es la venta de comestibles pero también se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en su domicilio donde atiende todos los días desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche o hasta que se agote el pan. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Nancy requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, leche y otras cosas más.
 
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends formed the community bank "El Mirador de Cconchaccalla" in the Cconchaccalla community of the district of San Jeronimo in the province and department of Cusco. This community bank is made up of people looking for every opportunity to succeed and through their daily efforts to provide a better future for their children. The main economic activities of the partners are agriculture and livestock, others are engaged in selling food, the sale of vegetables, and the raising of small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and more.

(Mrs. Nancy is raising her hand in the photograph). The member Nancy was born in the community of Cconchaccalla and lives in the same community where she was born.  She is 30 years old and has a common law relationship from which she has three children. Her main economic activity is selling food but she is also dedicated to agriculture and small animal husbandry.  She has a small shop in her home where every day she works from 5 am to 9 at night or until the bread runs out. She has been dedicated to this business for several years and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. At this time Nancy needs a loan to buy merchandise such as bags of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, milk and other things.

The group members as a whole appreciate the opportunity offered and agree to comply with the payment of their various fees within the prescribed period.

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas.  It is characterized as a tourist area for its archaeological sites through the historic center as well as for its landscapes and history, being a lovely city of the Southern Region of the country. Cusco is known as a popular tourist area, a commercial zone, and a city that celebrates the traditional festival of Inti Raymi.  It also offers one of the seven wonders of the world -- "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bags of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, milk and other things.

loans.name: Nuevo Progreso De Andahuaylillas Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Nuevo Progreso de Andahuaylillas” en el distrito  de Andahuaylillas de la provincia de Quispicanchis del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de artesanía, venta de comestibles, crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas y patos, venta de maíz y venta de golosinas. Otros socios se dedican a la agricultura. 

(La señora Mery  está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia Mery  nació en la ciudad de Anta pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Andahuaylillas, ella tiene 46 años de edad y es casada y fruto de unión tiene cuatro hijos. Su actividad económica principal de la socia Mery es la venta de comestibles, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en su domicilio donde atiende todos los días desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche o hasta que se agote el pan. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Mery requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, leche y otras cosas más.
 
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (La socia que aparece en la parte inferior de la fotografía llego tarde a la reunión del banco comunal).

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido tambien por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors formed the “Nuevo Progreso de Andahuaylillas” Communal Bank in the district of Andahuaylillas, in Quispicanchis Province in the department of Cusco. This communal bank is made up of people who always look for opportunities to move ahead and provide a better future for their children through their daily work. The members’ economic activities are, for example, handicraft sales, food sales, small animal husbandry (e.g. guinea pigs, chickens and ducks), corn sales and the sale of sweets. Other members are farmers.

Sra. Mery is shown in the photograph raising her hand. She was born in the city of Anta but now lives in the city of Andahuaylillas. She is 46 years old and is married with four children. Her principal business is food sales. She owns a small store in her home where she waits on customers every day from 5 in the morning until 9 at night or until the food runs out. She has had this business for several years and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. At this time Mery needs the loan to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, milk and other items. 

The members in general are grateful for the opportunity provided and are committed to making their payments on time. (The member who appears in the lower box in the photograph arrived late to the meeting of the communal bank.)

It should be noted that Cusco, located in the district and province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco right in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas  is characterized as being a tourist area due to its archaeological centers, its history, its landscape and because it is an enchanting city in the southern part of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi and because it has Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, milk and other items.

loans.name: Daniela Enedina

texts.es:
Darle un toque de belleza  a sus clientes y ofrecer un buen servicio, cómodo, rápido y de calidad es el trabajo de  Daniela una joven de 29 años de edad,  soltera, originaria de Estelí, ella se dedica al negocio de salón de belleza desde hace 2 años, ella a pesar de su corta edad  es una joven muy trabajadora  y emprendedora ya que le gusta ser independiente y tener experiencia en la vida, anteriormente vendía ropa usada negocio que decidió quitar porque no le generaba muchos ingresos, su nivel académico es de Licenciada en Contabilidad pero su deseo de superación la llevo a  realizar otros estudios de estilista profesional, hoy en día es una joven muy preparada. Inicio su negocio de salón de belleza con dinero que le presto un amigo para que comprara los accesorios que necesitaba tener en su salón,  el cual saca adelante por si sola no tiene apoyo de nadie, sus productos los comercializa en un local de Estelí  donde se siente satisfecha pues cuenta con clientes fijos además que es una zona donde no se mira ese tipo de negocio lo que hace mas atractivo el salón de Daniela para los habitantes de la zona, generándole a la vez mas ganancias que su anterior negocio. 
Solicita el crédito para comprar tintes y tratamientos para el cabello, tijeras, cepillo, secadora, etc. Todos los accesorios que necesita Daniela para darle el toque de belleza a sus clientes, ella estima que el crédito  será de ayuda ya que podrá invertir en su negocio para obtener mayores ganancias, sus planes futuros es ampliar el área del negocio, acondicionar con productos como sillas y brindar el servicio de SPA para darle una mejor atención a los clientes, su metas próximas es realizarle mejoras a su casa  con el objetivo de salir adelante y tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Daniela’s job is to give her customers a beauty touch and to offer them a quick, quality and comfortable service. She is 29 years old, she is single and she comes from Esteli. She has been running a beauty salon for 2 years, and in spite of her young age she is a very hard-working and resourceful young woman who likes being independent and having expectations in life. She used to sell used clothes but she decided to stop because she did not earn much. She has a Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, but her desire to get ahead in life has pushed her to study to become a professional stylist, and today she is a very well qualified young woman. She opened her beauty salon thanks to some money a friend of hers lent her to buy the tools she needed to have in her salon. She carries out her activity by herself, as she has no one that can support her. She sells her products in a shop located in Esteli, and she feels satisfied because she can count on established customers and because she works in an area with low competition for her business; this makes Daniela’s salon an attraction for the inhabitants of the area, making her earn more than with her previous activity.
She is requesting a loan to buy dyes and hair treatments, scissors, brushes and a hair dryer, as these are tools Daniela needs to give a beauty touch to her customers. She thinks that the loan will help her as she will be able to invest it in her activity to earn a better income. In the future she wants to expand her shop, to furnish it with chairs and to provide spa treatments to give a better service to her customers. Her next goals are to improve her house in order to get ahead in life and to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy dyes and hair treatments, scissors, brushes and a hair dryer.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: LA SRA. MARIA UNA MUJER INDEPENDIENTE Y DUEÑA DE SU PROPIO NEGOCIO, ESTA SOLICITANDO CREDITO PARA INVERTIR EN SU TIENDA DE ABARROTES, YA QUE LA COMPETENCIA LE HA AFECTADO MUCHO EN SUS VENTAS Y NECECITA MAS PRODUCTO PARA OFRECERLE AL CLIENTE Y APARTE IR CRECIENDO POCO A POCO EN LA RAMA DE LOS NEGOCIOS, ELLA ES COMERCIENTE DESDE HACE 10 AÑOS 7 MESES, SU ESPOSO EL SR. JUAN CARLOS  ACTUALMENTE ESTA TRABAJANDO EN UNA FABRICA DE LA LOCALIDAD, ELLOS NO TIENE DEPENDIENTES ECONIMICOS Y SUS INGRESOS SON MAS QUE NADA PARA CUBRIR SUS GASTOS DIARIOS Y OBTENER UN DINERO EXTRA. LA SRA. MARIA ESPERA QUE LE PODAMOS APOYAR Y ASI INCREMENTAR SUS GANANCIAS TANTO DE DINERO COMO DE CLIENTES.
texts.en: Maria is an independent woman and the owner of her own business. She is requesting this loan in order to invest in her grocery store, since competition has affected her sales a great deal and she needs more merchandise to offer her clients. Apart from this, in the business branch, there has been gradual growth. She has been a salesperson for the past ten years and seven months. Her husband, Juan Carlos, is now working in a local factory. They do not have economic dependents and their income goes more than anything toward covering their daily expenses and obtaining extra money. Maria hopes that we will be able to help her increase her gains in clients as well as income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Rosa Damari

texts.es: La señora Rosa Damaris, tiene por actividad económica la venta de cosméticos. Esta emprendedora inicio sus venta hace 7 años con el propósito de ir asía adelante y así ha ido creciendo gradualmente. El crédito que solicita es para comprar y vender  perfume, cremas, polvos, lápiz labial, cremas corporales, bases, rubor, antiarrugas, entre otros.
texts.en: Sra. Rosa Damaris’s business is cosmetic sales. This entrepreneur started selling seven years ago with the aim of getting ahead and her business has gradually been growing. The loan that she is requesting is to purchase and resell perfume, creams, powders, lipsticks, body creams, bases, rouge and anti-wrinkle products, among others.

loans.use: to purchase perfume, creams, powder, lipstick, body creams, bases, rouge and anti-wrinkle products, among others.

loans.name: Jean Damascene

texts.en:
Jean Damascene is 27 years old and is married with two children aged 1 year and 5 years old. He sells various goods such as: coffee, beans, maize, etc. Jean Damascene has 3 years of experience in this work and he currently employs 5 people to help him.

Jean Damascene has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as: coffee, beans, maize, etc. for re-sale. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and he will be able to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as: coffee, beans, maize, etc. for re-sale.

loans.name: Socorro De Los Santos

texts.es: La señora Socorro de los Santos se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Hace 8 años que tiene este negocio, el cual surgió como una necesidad de tener una herramienta de trabajo para ayudar con los gastos de su hogar  siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una persona responsable y que ha salido adelante con estos financiamientos. El crédito es para la compra de Pantalones, camisas, faldas, útiles escolares y ropa interior para hombre y mujer. Ella se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo que le ha ofrecido todo este tiempo fundación.
texts.en: Socorro de los Santos makes her living selling general merchandise. She has run this business for the past eight years. She started the business out necessity, in order to have a means of employment to help with her home expenses. She has always been known as a responsible person and one who has gotten ahead in life with the help of this financing. The loan is to buy pants, blouses, skirts, school supplies, and men's and women's undergarments. She feels grateful for the support that the foundation has offered her during all this time.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, skirts, school supplies, and men's and women's undergarments

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is 29 years old.  She is married to a businessman.  She sells beans and sorghum.  With the loan, Beatrice will buy more beans and sorghum to sell.  She will use the profits from the business to buy a motorbike to use as transport as well as to generate additional income.

loans.use: to buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Maira Marisa

texts.es:
Maira, se encuentra solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder fortalecer nuevamente el negocio comprándose la materia prima para continuar realizando la venta, se comprará maíz, gas, aceite, chicharrón, quesillo, que será una gran ayuda para que ella pueda tener a la mano todo lo necesario.
El préstamo anterior le permitió también poder tener un negocio en una mejor condición, trabajar arduamente con todos los ingredientes; hasta el momento su negocio se mantiene y ha logrado ganar nuevos clientes, en su familia sus condiciones están mejorando.
texts.en:
Maira is requesting a new loan to further strengthen her activity by buying basic products she needs to prepare the food she sells. She will buy corn, gas, oil, fried pork skin and curd, and this will be a great help for her as she will have everything that she needs at her disposal.
Thanks to the loan she has previously requested she has succeeded in improving the conditions of her shop, working very hard as well thanks to the ingredients she has been able to purchase. At the moment her activity is stable and she has succeeded in attracting new customers; the living conditions of her family are improving as well.

loans.use: To buy corn, gas, oil, fried pork skin and curd.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es:
José,  vive con su esposa y tres hijos, el administra una joyería, este negocio lo inició gracias al apoyo de un hermano quien también es joyero, trabajan de forma ambulante no tienen un horario establecido.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de joyas de oro, aretes, collares, pulseras, entre otras prendas que pueda comercializarse en el negocio, este préstamo le dará a José la fortaleza necesaria para surtir de prendas nuevas y poder seguir trabajando.
Su objetivo es desarrollarse en el negocio, espera conseguirlo a través de este financiamiento, también poder ampliar el número de clientes y poder proveer a su familia lo necesario para la subsistencia.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and three children.  He has a jewelry business, which he started thanks to support from his brother, who is also a jeweler.  They work in an itinerant manner, and they do not have an established schedule.

He is requesting a loan to buy gold jewelry, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets, and other jewelry that he can sell in his business.  This loan will give José the power to stock new jewelry and to be able to continue working.

His objective is to develop in the business, and he hopes to do so through this loan.  He also wants to be able to increase his number of customers and to be able to provide his family what they need to survive.

loans.use: to buy gold jewelry, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets.

loans.name: Tikariy Quillahuata Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Tikariy Quillahuata” en la comunidad de Quillahuata del distrito de San Sebatian de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas principal de los socios son la agricultura y ganadería, otros se dedican a la venta de comestibles,   a la venta de verduras, a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas y otros más.   

(El señor Juan está levantando la mano en la fotografía). El socio Juan nació en la comunidad de Quillahuata y vive en la misma  comunidad donde nació, él tiene 52 años de edad y es casado y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos. El Socio Juan es albañil y trabaja de forma independiente pero tiene dos ayudantes. Ya son 27 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Actualmente, el señor Juan está trabajando haciendo los acabados de en una casa particular. En esta oportunidad el socio Juan requiere el préstamo para comprar herramientas y materiales como por ejemplo mayólica, cemento, pintura y otras cosas más.    
 
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors formed the “Tikariy Quillahuata” Communal Bank in the community of Quillahuata, in San Sebatian District in Cusco Province and Cusco Department. This communal bank is made up of people who are always looking for ways to move ahead and provide a better future for their children through their daily work. The members’ principal economic activities are farming and stock breeding. Others are involved in food sales, the sale of vegetables and the raising of small animals, such as guinea pigs, chickens and ducks.

Sr. Juan is shown in the photograph raising his hand. He was born in the community of Quillahuata and continues to live in the same community where he was born. He is 52 years old and is married and has six children. Sr. Juan is a mason and is self-employed, however he has two assistants.  He has had this business for 27 years and it is going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work. At this time Juan is making finishing touches to a private house and needs the loan to buy tools and materials, such as Majolica (glazed earthenware), cement, paints and other items.  

The members in general are grateful for the opportunity provided and are committed to making their payments on time. 

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco, right in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas and is characterized as being a tourist area due to its archaeological centers, its history, its landscape and because it is an enchanting city in the southern part of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional festival, Inti Raymi, and because it has Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase tools and materials, such as Majolica, cement, paints and other items.

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is 28 years old. He is single. He has owned a bar for two years. The loan requested will be for adding more non-alcoholic drinks and beer to sell. He plans to use the profits for reinvesting in the business.

loans.use: To buy more beer to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is applying for a loan of $1,000. She has two children and is 42 years old. Maria's husband is helping her to go to an area near the town to buy firewood and sell it in the city. She is making good income from selling firewood. With the loan, she will buy more firewood to sell.

loans.use: To buy firewood to sell

loans.name: Aocns' Group

texts.en: Aocns's group is comprised of four hardworking women. Aocns is 20 years old and lives in the town of Kachwamba in the Fort Portal region of Uganda. She is single and has one child. For the past two years, Aocns has been working hard to manage her market business selling fresh foods like matooke [green plantain]. To help expand her business, Aocns has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more fresh foods like matooke for resale and will help Aocns to generate greater profits for her medical expenses. Aocns hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land and build on it. Aocns is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life skills training. The ELA program has improved Aocns's future prospects by helping her to learn how to budget.

loans.use: to buy more fresh foods like matooke for resale.

loans.name: Alver Marcelo

texts.es:
Alver de 27 años de edad, vive en la linda ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se encuentra ubicado en uno de los departamentos de nuestra selva amazónica, es una ciudad muy bella y llena de flora y fauna muy impresionante y sobre todo los pobladores de la zona son muy amables, Pucallpa es una ciudd en la cual uno puede olvidarse del bullicio de la ciudad y descansar y sobre todo relajarse con lo maravilloso de su naturaleza. Alver en sus tiempos libre le gusta mucho salir a pasear con su familia, sobre todo porque comprarte grato momentos con ellos, en ocasiones también junto a su familia le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”.  Sus padres son personas muy humildes pero gracias a su esfuerzo pudieron darle una profesión la cual es la enfermería.

Muy temprano a horas de la madrugada Alver se levanta para poder abrir su negocio de venta d e plátano de seda, el trabaja alrededor de alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el día, el es muy carismáticos con todos sus clientes y por ello el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque los clientes siempre se van a sus hogares muy contentos y muy bien atendidos.

Alver está muy feliz y muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le brindado el podrá compra una pequeña parcela para poder tener una parcela propia para sembrar sus propias frutas que ofrece, lo que le permitirá sembrar sus propios frutales y así mejorar sus ingresos ya que no tendrá que comprar la fruta a otros agricultores, así el podrá seguir trabajando y luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a  su hijos y Tener un negocio más grande y una gran parcela para cultivar sus frutales”.
texts.en:
Alver, 27, lives in the beautiful city of Pucalpa, located in one of the departments of our Amazon jungle.  It’s a very beautiful city full of very impressive flora and fauna, and, on top of that, the people of the area are very friendly.  Pucallpa is a city where one can forget the racket of the city and rest, and especially relax in its marvelous nature.  In his free time Alver likes to go out with his family, and particularly to share great moments with them.  Sometimes, also, together with his family he likes to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “arroz con pollo”, chicken with rice.  His parents are very humble people but thanks to their effort, they could give him a profession which is nursing.

Alver rises very early in the morning to be able to open his business of selling bananas.  He works around 9 hours per day and can see up to 15 customers each day.  He is very charismatic and he feels that his business is going well because his customers always go home contented and well taken care of.

Alver is very happy and grateful with the loans from Kiva since thanks to the help, he will buy a small piece of land for himself where he can plant his own fruit that he sells.  This will allow him to have his own orchards and thus improve his income since he won’t have to buy fruit from other farmers.  Then he will be able to continue working and fighting each day to turn his big dream into reality.  This is “to give his children a good education and to have a bigger business and a large parcel of land to grow his fruit trees”.

loans.use: to buy a parcel of land

loans.name: Damaris Carolina

texts.es: Damaris es una mujer trabajadora y  emprendedora, inicio su negocio desde hace mas de 5 años que es la compra y venta de calzado. Damaris es una mujer con ganas de salir adelante.  Ella solicita financiamiento para compra y venta de zapatos, de cuero, zapatillas, deportivos para niños y adultos y zapatos para damas. Damaris se siente muy agradecía porque gracia a fundación 2000 a podido realizar su sueño ya que su negocia ha crecido en el transcurso del tiempo.
texts.en: Damaris is a hardworking and enterprising woman.  She makes a living buying and selling shoes, and started her business more than 5 years ago.  Damaris is determined to get ahead.  She is asking for a loan so she can purchase shoes to sell, including leather shoes, casual shoes, athletic shoes for children and adults, and women’s shoes.  Damaris is very grateful to Fundación 2000 for helping make her dream a reality, since her business has grown over time.

loans.use: to purchase shoes to sell, including leather shoes, casual shoes, athletic shoes for children and adults, and women’s shoes.

loans.name: Iria

texts.en: Iria is applying for a loan of $600. She has one child. She is 30 years old. She has a kiosk and is happy with the activity that she is doing. She says that opening a kiosk is better than the other activities because she makes money every day from selling things in her kiosk. This loan is helping her and she is thinking of opening a bigger store.

loans.use: To buy beer to sell

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en: Josefina is applying for a loan of $1,000. She has one child and is 32 years old. She is requesting this loan to gain working capital to buy things to put in her store. Selling things in her store keeps her busy, but she is happy with her daily income from her store.

loans.use: To buy cigarettes and beer to sell

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 29 years old and married with two children. He also takes care of four relatives. He sells various goods such as biscuits, juice, lotions, sugar, etc., and he currently employs one person to help him. 

Patrick has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods such as biscuits, juice, lotions, sugar, etc., for re-sale. He will save any profits for his future and he will be able to re-invest in his business.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as biscuits, juice, lotions, sugar, etc., for re-sale.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en: Beatriz is applying for a loan of $1,000. She has one child and is 28 years old. She sells second-hand clothes in a town just next to the main road. She makes good income from selling clothes. She feels better when she takes a loan to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to sell

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
This is Raquel, 42, a resident of Pasay City, Philippines. She is married to Ronie, a security guard, and is a mother. Together with her husband,  she manages the household while operating their business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Raquel runs a direct-selling business, selling clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics, and other products from popular direct-selling brands such as Avon, Fullerlife, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and others. Raquel purchases her customers' orders in cash, then turns the purchases over to the customers, extending credit for a month. Her costs are lower than the catalogue prices paid by the customers. Raquel's regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 2,000 PHP in sales every week.

She is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. 
 
Raquel fervently hopes that her children will be able to graduate one day. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship members* every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase additional supplies and merchandise needed in her business.

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.en:
Marie Louise is 35 years old and is married with five children between 3 and 14 years old. She sells various goods such as clothes, soap, salt, cooking oil, etc. She has three years of experience in this work and she currently employs three people to help her. 

Marie Louise has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods such as clothes, soap, salt, cooking oil, etc., for re-sale. With any profits, she will be able to save money for her future and she will be able to pay the school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as clothes, soap, salt, cooking oil, etc., for re-sale.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en: Jacqueline, age 37, sells rice and sorghum. She has been in this business for the last six years. The loan requested will be for adding new items such as sugar, maize flour and rice to sell. With the profits from the business, she will be paying school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, rice and maize flour for sale.

loans.name: David Arturo

texts.es:
David, vive con su familia, su esposo y un hijo, solamente él trabaja en la familia, realizando la elaboración de pan, este oficio lo inicio gracias al apoyo de su hermana, quien tambien es panadera, no tiene un horario fijo, contando hasta la fecha con una gran experiencia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales, los cuales utiliza en la panadería como el azúcar, la harina, jaleas, huevos, bolsas de empaque, entre otros más materiales necesarios para realizar su trabajo, este préstamo le dará los recursos necesarios para poder trabajar.
La aspiración de David es poder crecer en la panadería, tener una casa propia donde poder vivir con su familia, además que desea tener la suficiente fortaleza para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
David lives with his family, his wife, and his son. He is the only one in the family who works, making bread. He started this business thanks to the support of his sister, who is also a baker. He doesn't have a fixed schedule. As of today, he has a great deal of experience.

He is requesting this loan in order to purchase supplies for use in he bakery, including sugar, flour, jellies, eggs, and bags for packaging, among other materials essential to his work. This loan will give him the resources he needs to be able to work.

David's aspiration is to be able to grow his bakery and to have his own house where he can live with his family. He would also like to have enough strength to continue working.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, jellies, eggs, and bags for packaging.

loans.name: Veronica De La Concepcion

texts.es: La señora verónica de la concepción, tiene por actividad económica la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio, ella durante todo este tiempo ha ido creciendo gradualmente. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de perfumerías en general, cremas, polvos, lápiz labial, cremas corporales, bases, rubor, antiarrugas, entre otros.
texts.en: Verónica de la Concepción makes her living selling cosmetics. She has had this business for the past six years. During this time, the business has been growing gradually. She is requesting this loan in order to buy wholesale perfumes, creams, powders, lipstick, lotions, bases, blush, and anti-wrinkle creams, among other things.

loans.use: to buy wholesale perfumes, creams, powders, lipstick, lotions, bases, blush, and anti-wrinkle creams, among other things.

loans.name: Alex B.'s Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a Kiva partner in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from Makeni. Like their counterparts in other regions of the country, these borrowers are going to use this loan for different purposes. At the end of each month, they will repay their loan using their monthly salaries. Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for making the deductions and repaying SMT/Kiva on their behalf. 

Alex (pictured on the left) is the leader of this group of teachers. Born in Freetown 32 years ago, Alex is married and is the father of one primary school child. He has been a professional teacher for nine years now. Alex is pursuing further studies in college. He has requested this loan to pay for his college fees.

loans.use: to pay for his college fees

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma lives in Mombasa, Kenya, and is a carpenter who does wood work. He has been involved in this trade for the last eight years. He admits that he was first drawn into the trade by seeing the beauty of the items made by carpenters while in school. Later on, he was employed in a carpentry shop. Juma made savings regularly, which formed part of the capital of the current business he owns.

He is married and has one child. Juma was introduced to Milango by his friend and is applying for a loan of 41,850 Kenya Shillings to purchase additional products for his business, e.g. wood, nails, etc. His ambition is to open branches in other areas in the near future and build a shoe room.

The main challenge of the business is price fluctuations. He believes the income from this business will help him educate his children.

loans.use: To buy additional products for his business, e.g. wood, nails, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase additional night dresses, curtains, and bed sheets

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel lives in the coastal town of Mombasa, Kenya. He is the father of two children and runs a transport business. He owns a motorcycle which he uses to transport people and goods. The regions around the area lack a reliable road network and the motorcycles provide a convenient means to travel on business errands. Besides this, he also owns a retail shop. He previously rented a motorcycle, saved money and moved on to start the business.

Daniel was introduced to Milango by a friend and is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenyan shillings to purchase additional retail stock. Daniel believes the income from this loan will help him meet his family's needs, buy motorcycles and employ more people. His future ambition is to own a public transport vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase additional retail stock.

loans.name: Violette

texts.en: Violette is 36 years old. She is married to a farmer. They have five children, and only four of them are enrolled in school. She has been in the business of selling different kind of drinks in a pub for seven years. With the loan, she wants to buy more beers and sodas to sell. The profits from the business will be used for paying school fees for their children and buying a cow to provide milk for the family.

loans.use: To buy more beers and sodas to sell

loans.name: Munyoki

texts.en:
Munyoki lives in the coastal town of Mombasa, Kenya. He began as an employee, and then purchased his own motorcycle from his savings.

He is married and runs a transport business; he owns a motorcycle, which he uses to transport people and goods. The regions around the area lack a reliable road network, and the motorcycles provide a convenient means to travel for business errands.

Munyoki was introduced to Milango by a friend and is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenya Shillings to add to his savings in order to purchase another motorcycle.

Munyoki believes the income from this loan will help him meet his family's needs. His ambition is to own a three-wheeler.

loans.use: To purchase another motorcycle

loans.name: Daphrose

texts.en: Daphrose is 49 years old. She is a widow, and she has five children, who all go to school. She sells sodas and alcoholic drinks. She wants to get this loan to buy more non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks to sell. The profits from the business will be used for paying school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks to sell

loans.name: Luz De Bendicion 1, 2, 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Marie is one of the members of the “Luz de Bendicion (Light of blessing) 1, 2, 3 & 4 group" which is comprised of 20 micro-businesswomen. They are involved in the sale of clothing, natural products, shoes, food, etc. Marie lives in the city of La Romana. Its economy depends on tourism and the sugarcane industry.

Marie is very excited to receive her fourth loan from Esperanza Internacional, having satisfactorily repaid her previous loan and taken an important step in her business growth. She has had her business for about nine years; she started it with her savings. She is running a retail business, where she sells hair and beauty products, clothes, shoes and cosmetics. She is planning on investing the new loan to increase her inventory and to respond to her clients. She does her sales from her house, by walking around with products and a catalog. When she sells via the catalog, her clients order an item, she buys it and most of them pay on credit.

Marie’s family is made up of herself and her three children, two of whom live in her house. She is now single because she separated from her long-term partner. She tells us that her greatest challenge is to build her house into a better structure. She will use her profits to save and start making changes to her house by building little by little. She thanks you all for your support!!

loans.use: to buy products for resale, such as shoes, cosmetics, clothes, etc.

loans.name: Francess F.'s Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a Kiva partner in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from Makeni. Like their counterparts in other regions of the country, these borrowers are going to use this loan for different purposes. At the end of each month, they will repay their loan using their monthly salaries. Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for making the deductions and repaying SMT/Kiva on their behalf. 

Francess is the leader of this group. Born in Gbanty village in northern Sierra Leone about 52 years ago, Francess is married and is the mother of three children: one in primary school, one in secondary school and one in college. Francess has been a professional teacher for 34 years now. She has requested this loan to buy house building materials (iron corrugated zincs, cement, etc.) for the construction of a family dwelling house.

loans.use: to buy house building materials (iron corrugated zincs, cement, etc.) for the construction of a family dwelling house

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en: Luzviminda is from Catadman, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She is 64 years old and widowed. Luzviminda prepares and sells cooked food for daily meals. She has been in her business for eight years and earns 6,000 PHP a month. In 2006, Luzviminda joined GDMPC. Luzviminda is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP which will be used to purchase the raw ingredients needed to make dishes. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en: Mary Jane is 33 years old, and married with four children. She is from Calabayan, Ozamiz City. Mary Jane used her last loan to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Her business has grown and become successful. She is now taking a new loan to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She hopes to be able to further grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en: Elenita is a widow with two children. She is 46 years old and lives in Bagakay, Ozamis City, Philippines. Elenita owns and plans a plot of farm land with coconuts to earn a living. She has been in this business for four years and earns PHP 8,200 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 14,500 to purchase farm chemicals. Elenita has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for three years. In the future, Elenita's plan is to save her returns in order to buy a car.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en: Pacita of Clarin, Misamis Occidental has raised pigs for more than five years and earns 6,570 per month. She’s 66 years old yet continues to run her pig business to provide for her three children. She been a member of GDMPC since 2004. In order to grow her livestock for selling, she is borrowing an amount of 10,000 from GDMPC microcredit to purchase feeding supplies. Pacita hopes that someday her children will be successful in their careers.

loans.use: to purchase feeding supplies.

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es:
EL SEÑOR HILARIO SIEMPRE ESTA PREOCUPADO POR EL BIEN ESTAR DE SU PATRIMONIO Y EL BIEN ESTAR DE SU FAMILIA ESTA OCACION HILARIO QUIERE PONER UNA BANQUETA ENFRENTE DE SU CASA Y PARTE DENTRO DELTERRENO DE SU DOMICILIO. 
TRABAJA EN UNA FABRICA DE LA LOCALIDAD, HILARIO ES PADRE DE DOS NIÑOS Y JUNTO CON SU ESPOSA DESEAN MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA Y MEJORAR SU VIVIENDA POCO A POCO.
COMO TODOS SABEN Y QUIEREN LA MEJORA DEL DOMICILIO ES LO PRINCIPAL PARA CADA FAMILIA Y ES POR ESO QUE HILARIO QUIERE REMODELAR POCO A POCO ASI TENDRA Y PODRA DEJAR UN  PATRIMONIO MEJOR A SUS HIJOS. ES POR ESO QUE HILARIO QUIERE QUE SUS HIJOS CRESCAN EN UN HAMBIENTE SALUDABLE.
texts.en:
Hilario is always concerned for the well being of his heritage and the well being of his family.  On this occasion, Hilario would like to put a sidewalk in front of his house and on part of the land of his home. 

He works in a factory in his town.  Hilario is a father of two children and, along with his wife, would like a better quality of life and to improve their household little by little. 

As everyone knows and wants the improvement of their home, it comes first for each family. And it is for this reason that Hilario wants to remodel his home little by little so that he will have a better heritage and be able to leave a better heritage for his children.  That is why Hilario wants his children to grow up in a healthy environment.

loans.use: to create a sidewalk.

loans.name: Erdenejargal

texts.en: Erdenejargal, 32, lives with her husband and two children in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her children are kindergarten students. Her husband operates his own private business. She just started selling clothes at the Narantuul international black market. She has many regular customers and suppliers. Her business is sustainable. She owns an old house. She wants to renovate the house and turn it into a store where she can sell clothes. The 3,000,000 MNT loan will be used to buy the necessary building materials to repair her house. She is a diligent and creative women.

loans.use: To renovate her house to sell clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Randy

texts.en: Randy is from Nailon, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. He is 39 years old. Randy is married with three children. To make a living, Randy owns and operates a passenger van service. Randy has had his business for five years and earns 10,000 PHP a month. In 2010, Randy joined GDMPC. Randy is requesting a loan of 16,800 PHP which will be used to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. He plans to use the additional revenue to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Agustin

texts.en: Agustin is from Luksoon, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. He is 37 years old. Agustin is married with five children. To make a living, Agustin plants, harvests and sell bananas. He has been in his business for more than five years and earns 3,000 PHP a month. In 2009, Agustin joined GDMPC. He is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to grow. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to grow.

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is married with two children. She is 43 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.
Mercedita has a rice retail business. She has had this business for 20 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 5,000. She has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase construction materials for a house renovation. Mercedita has been a member of PMPC for eight years.
In the future, Mercedita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials for house renovation.

loans.name: Señor De Accha Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE ACCHA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Pisaq, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jovita ella es conviviente y tiene 38 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara arroz con pollo, pollo al horno entre otros platos, la socia trabaja en el mercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo despues la foto porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de vidrios, negocio de venta de artesanías y negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The village bank "Senor de Accha" is located in the district of Pisaq, in the province and department of Cusco. 

One of the members, Jovita, is 38 years old, married and has 2 children. She sells food, preparing dishes like chicken and rice and baked chicken, among other things. She works in the market from 8:00am until 7:00pm on average. The business allows her to make progress for her children. Her dream is to have a locale to sell her food in. She asks for this loan to buy ingredients like chicken, beef and vegetables.

Jovita was added to the picture because she was unable to make the group picture due to her work.

The other members of the bank work in businesses like vegetable sales, glass, arts and crafts, and grocery stores. 

She is grateful to those who are a part of her dream in this way, and promises to make her payments in the established time period.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like chicken, beef and vegetables.

loans.name: Marcosa

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de preparacion de chicha y tambien se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales menores,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes,gallinas y chanchos y tambien para comprar fertilizantes y semillas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The bank member continues her work in agriculture, and also makes chicha [a corn drink] and raises small animals. Via these businesses, she is able to take care of her kids. Her dream is to increase her farming business. She asks for a loan to buy guinea pigs, hens and pigs, as well as fertilizers and seeds.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, hens and pigs, as well as fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Russel Ann

texts.en: Rusell Ann is married with no children. She is 32 years old and lives in Poblacion 3, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. For four years she has owned and managed a general store. Each month, she earns about PHP 10,500. She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.. She has been a member of GDMPC for three years. In the future, Rusell Ann hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc..

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is widowed with three children. She is 46 years old and lives in San Andres, Panaon, Misamis Occidental.
Amalia sells snacks to earn a living and has had this business for two years. She has requested a loan of 4,000 to be used to purchase additional snacks for sale.
Amalia has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Amalia hopes to engage in other types of business.

loans.use: To purchase additional snacks for sale.

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Miguela is from Mialen, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 43 years old, and married with five children. Miguela prepares and sells cooked food. Miguela has been in her business for seven years and earns 10,000 PHP per month.
In 2004, Miguela joined Kiva partner, GDMPC. Miguela is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP which will be used to purchase the raw ingredients needed to make the dishes. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase the raw ingredients needed to make products.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosalina is 57 years old and has one child who is in school.

Rosalina has a general store business in the Philippines. Rosalina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

Rosalina has been in this business for five years. In the future, Rosalina would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
Celsa is 53 years old and married with three children.

Celsa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her store.

Celsa has borrowed and repaid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running a general store for 11 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane, vegetables, rice, and corn.

Celsa aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Ana has been in this business for five years. She earns additional income from her general store.

Ana has been sustaining her business through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Nelly Esther

texts.es:
Nelly tiene  58 años de edad, es una mujer con un espíritu muy alegre y sobre todo que ella nos comenta que tendrá 58 años pero su espíritu es de una joven de solo 20 porque los años pasan pero la alegría y las ganas de vivir siempre deben ser como la un joven. Su vivienda de Nelly se encuentra en la linda ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura, la pesca, por sus atractivos turísticos como son las Islas Ballestas y el candelabro de Paracas, también posee playas hermosas y sobre todo se caracteriza por la generosidad de sus pobladores. Nelly es muy hábil con los palillo de tejer por ello cuando dispone de un tiempito libre le gusta mucho tejer sobre todo chompas, chalinas, entre otros, asimismo le gusta cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres Nelly solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar Enfermería.

Día a día y desde muy tempranito Nelly se levanta para ir a trabajar en su negocio de venta de flores, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes en el día, siempre tiene un carácter muy amable y por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque los clientes siempre salen contentos y también porque es muy honrada y muy creativa para hacer sus arreglos.

Nelly esta muy feliz y muy agradecida con la ayuda brindada por los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como flores en fardos, ya que en cada fardo vienen muchas variedades de flores, con ello mejoraría sus ingresos y tendría mas variedad de flores en especial porque se acerca el día del padre y en esta época aumentan los clientes, así ella seguirá trabajando con esa alegría y esas ganas que la caracterizan para asi poder luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Construir su vivienda de material noble y tener otro puesto de venta de flores”.
texts.en:
Nelly, 58, is a woman with a very joyful spirit and above all she tells us that although she may be 58, her spirit is that of a 20 year old because the years pass but joy and the zest for life should always be like that of a young person.  Nelly’s home is in the beautiful city of Pisco, a city known for its agriculture, fisheries, for its tourist attractions such as the Ballestas Islands and the Candelabro de Paracas, also its beautiful beaches, and above all for the generosity of its people.  Nelly is very a skillful knitter so when she has free time she really likes to knit, mostly sweaters and scarves among other things.  She also likes to cook one of her favorite dishes which is very delicious “Arroz con Pato” [Rice with duck]. Because of the limited economic resources of her parents, Nelly was only able to study through high school, but she would have liked to study nursing. 

Every day, Nelly gets up very early to go work in her business of selling flowers.  She works approximately 10 hours a day and can attend up to 30 customers a day.  She is always very kind and because of this she believes she does well in her business because her customers always leave happy and also because she is very honest and very creative in making the flower arrangements. 

Nelly is very happy and very grateful for the help she has received from the Kiva loans.  Thanks to the help that they have given her she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business such as flowers in bundles since each bundle comes with many flower varieties.  With this she will be able to improve her earnings and will have a greater variety of flowers especially for Father’s Day because during this time there are a greater number of customers.  She will keep working with the joy and desire that she is known for so that she can keep fighting to accomplish her greatest dream: “To build a home with good materials and to have another stall from which to sell flowers.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise (flowers in bundles).

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al trabajo de administradora en un hotel,la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es mejorar en su trabajo.La socia solicita el credito para uso personal para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sofia continues to make her living as an administrator in a hotel.  She works from 6:00am until 6:00pm.  Through this job, she has been able to get her children ahead.  Her dream is to improve at her job.  She is requesting a loan for personal use to buy a television for her home. 

Sofia is happy for the loan and she is committed to make the payments.

loans.use: to buy a television for her home.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y pollos,la socia sigue trabajando en un hotel donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio y trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de crianza de animlaes y mejorar en su negocio.La socia solicita el credito para comprar animales como cuyes y pollos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Tomasa continues to make her living in her business of raising animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She continues to work in a hotel where she works from 8:00am until 6:00pm.  Through this job she has been able to get her children ahead.  Her dream is to expand her business of raising animals and to improve her business. She is requesting this loan to buy animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. 

She is happy for the loan and she is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Sandra Vanessa

texts.es: Sandra Vanessa, casado, con dos hijos meñores de edad, tiene por actividad economica una pulperia ubiacada en su casa de habitacion, el negocio lo inico para tener una herramienta de trabajo para mantener los gastos de su hogar cuando su esposo se vio sin empleo, en la actualidad le ha ido bien gracias a su empeño esfuerzo y tenacidad, y gracias al apoyo que fundacion le brinda con los fiananciamiento , en esta ocacion esta solicitando el financiamiento para  la compra de productos del hogar como: avena, tiste, cebada, arroz, azucar, frijoles, pan, leche, huevos, entre otros.
texts.en:
Sandra Vanessa is married and has two young children. She has a small grocery store located in her house. She started her business to have a way to meet the household expenses when her husband was out of work. Now it's going well thanks to her entrepreneurship, hard work and tenacity, and also thanks to the support that the foundation has given her via the loans. 

On this occasion she's asking for a loan to buy products like oatmeal, tiste [a corn-based beverage], barley, rice, sugar, beans, bread, milk, eggs and other things.

loans.use: to buy goods like oatmeal, tiste [a corn based drink], barley, rice, sugar, beans, bread, milk, eggs, and other things.

loans.name: Melinda

texts.es:
Melinda tiene 35 años, su pareja es Edberto, con quien tiene siete hijos. Todos ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de La Unión, Leticia.     
Ella es una mujer de coraje y fortaleza. Su numerosa familia hizo que aprenda a dedicarse a varias actividades. De madrugada se encarga de preparar los ricos panes que vende diariamente a su comunidad, luego prepara los alimentos para sus hijos, ya que la mayoría se encuentra en edad escolar. La actividad que más ganancias le genera es la venta de leña, por eso siempre invierte en la compra de árboles al por mayor, “compró un lote de 100 árboles, y lo corto con la ayuda de peones a los que pago por día”, menciona. Lleva como 5 años en este negocio, en todo este tiempo consiguió compradores que llevan la mercadería en grandes cantidades, que trasladan la leña hacia otras localidades, así asegura sus ventas. Su actividad es rentable y manejable, ya que contrata personal con el que agiliza su actividad. Además obtiene ingresos extra de la venta de los animales menores que cría como: cuyes y conejos.

Este es su crédito número 10 con MFP, por eso muestra mucho agradecimiento por la confianza. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La Unión hace la fuerza”, y se siente a gusto trabajando con personas responsables.
Melinda invertirá el dinero en la compra de 4 lotes de árboles para abastecer su negocio, ya que tiene pedidos para este mes.
texts.en:
Melinda, 35, and her partner Edberto have seven children.  All of them live in her own home located in La Union, Leticia. 

She is a woman of courage and strength.  Her large family caused her to learn to make her living in various activities.  In the early morning, she is responsible for preparing the delicious breads that she sells daily in her community.  She then prepares food for her children since most of them are still in school. The activity that generates the most revenue is the sale of wood, for this reason she always invests in the purchase of trees wholesale. “I buy a lot of 100 trees and I buy them with the help of laborers which I pay per day.” she mentions. She has been in this business for about 5 years.  During this time she has found buyers that take the goods in large quantities and bring the wood to other locations thus ensuring her sales.  This activity is cost effective and manageable since she hires personnel that streamline the business.  She also has additional income from the sale of small animals that she raises such as guinea pigs and rabbits. 

This is her 10th loan with MFP and because of this she is very grateful for their confidence.  She is a member of the communal bank “La Union hace la fuerza” and she feels good working with responsible people. 

Melinda will use the money to buy 4 lots of trees to supply her business since she has orders to fill for this month.

loans.use: to buy trees so as to cut wood to sell.

loans.name: Fabiola De Los Angeles

texts.es: Fabiola de los Angeles de 25 años de edad de la localidad de leon, su activiadad economica es la venta de mercaderia en general, tiene tres años de experiencia, esta emprendedora ha demostrado su ganas de superacion personal y de su negocio, gracia a su esfuerzo tiene una gran variedad de clientes, el cual ha podido sastifacer con sus  servicio y sus encargos ya que los cumple en tiempo y forma, en la actualidad esta solicitando el financiamiento para invertir en en el negocio ya sus venta ha incrementado por  las festividades de la celebracion del dia del padre por lo tanto tiene que aprobecha la temporado,  quiere invertir en los diferentes productos como: camisas de hombre,pantalones de hombre, calsetines, camisetas blanca , panuelos, boxer, tuallas, entre otro.
texts.en:
Fabiola de los Angeles, 25, is from Leon.  She makes her living in the sale of general merchandise.  She has three years of experience.  This enterprising woman has shown her desire to do well personally and in her business.  Thanks to her efforts, she has a large variety of customers which she has been able to satisfy with her services and special orders, which she always makes in a timely matter.  

She is requesting this loan to invest in her business since her sales have increased because of Father’s Day festivities.  She has to make the most of this time and she wants to invest in different products such as men’s shirts, men’s pants, socks, white shirts, handkerchiefs, boxers, and towels among other things.

loans.use: to buy men’s shirts, men’s pants, socks, white shirts, handkerchiefs, boxers, and towels among other things.

loans.name: Violette

texts.en: Violette is 50 years old. She is a mother of two children between the ages of 20 and 23, both go to school. She sells different items in her boutique (general store). With the loan, she wants to add maize flour and rice to her boutique to sell. The profit from the business will be used to pay for school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs, such as maize flour and rice for the boutique.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 33 años, su pareja es Payano, con quien tiene tres hijos, quienes se encuentran en edad escolar. Esta joven familia vive en una casa alquilada en el distrito agrícola de La Unión, Leticia.
Desde que unió su vida a la del padre de sus hijos se dedica a la agricultura y labores del campo, cuenta con terrenos de cultivos donde produce verduras y hortalizas. Pero la actividad donde pone mayor empeño es en la crianza de cerdos, aunque también cría cuyes y conejos. Ella adquiere pequeños cerdos a 100 soles, en  4 meses los alimenta y engorda, para luego venderlos a 500 soles. “El negocio es rentable, por eso cada vez que realizo mis ventas compro otros chanchitos con un porcentaje de las ganancias”, menciona. Sonia tiene terrenos de cultivos donde pasta con libertad a sus animales. Dice que su trabajo es relajado pero que tiene que atender a sus animales constantemente de las enfermedades y alimentación.

Este es el crédito número 5 que obtiene de MFP, por eso se compromete, una vez más, a pagar con puntualidad. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La Unión hace la fuerza”, donde sus socias son amigas responsables. 
Con el dinero de este préstamo podrá comprar 10 chanchitos que engordará y negociará más adelante.
texts.en:
Sonia is 33. Her partner is Payano, and they have three school-age children. This young family lives in a rented house in the farming district of La Unión. 

Since she joined her life to that of her children's father, Leticia has farmed. She has plots of farmland where she produces greens and vegetables.

But the activity where she puts her greatest effort is raising pigs, although she also raises guinea pigs and rabbits.

She acquires small pigs for 100 soles, and feeds and fattens them over a four-month period, in order to then sell them for 500 soles. "The business is profitable, and that's why every time I make my sales, I buy other piglets with a percentage of the earnings," she comments. 

Sonia has plots of farmland where she grazes her animals freely. She says that her work is relaxed, but she has to tend to her animals constantly:  keeping them from getting sick, and feeding them. 

This is the fifth loan she is obtaining from MFP, so she promises to once again make her payments on time. She belongs to the "La Unión Hace la Fuerza (Unity Makes Strength) communal bank, where her co-members are responsible friends. 

With the money from this loan, she will be able to buy 10 piglets that she will fatten and sell later on.

loans.use: To buy ten piglets to raise.

loans.name: Nery

texts.es:
Nery tiene 43 años, está casada con Eleazar, con quien tiene siete hijos. Su numerosa familia viven en una casa alquilada ubicada en la localidad agrícola de La Unión, Leticia.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y creativa. Con la paciencia que la caracteriza supo empezar un negocio de venta de comida en el día, en un espacio que acondicionó en su vivienda. Por las también noches prepara comida rápida como hamburguesas y pollo frito con papas. Y además se dedica a la agricultura, ya que desde pequeña apoyaba en las labores que sus padres realizaban en el campo. Actualmente siembra habas, arveja, espinaca, papas, maíz y todo lo que sus tierras puedan producir. Con el tiempo y la experiencia que tiene, logró adecuarse bien al mercado y alquiló más terrenos de cultivo, con ello puede sembrar en grandes cantidades, por ende obtiene mejores ganancias y cubrir sus necesidades básicas. Ahora quiere comprar sus propios terrenos de cultivo, pues una de sus metas es ampliar su producción y abrir un restaurante. Sabe que con trabajo y dedicación lo puede lograr.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La unión hace la fuerza” y este es el séptimo crédito que tiene con MFP. Está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal, por tener compañeras solidarias. 
Nery invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para empezar una siembra de arvejas y espinaca.
texts.en:
Nery, 43, is married to Eleazar with whom she has 7 children.  Her large family lives in a rented house located in the farming town of La Union, Leticia. 

She is a hard-working and creative woman. With the patience that she is known for, she started a business selling food during the day in space she furnished in her home.  In the evening, she also prepares fast food such as hamburgers and fried chicken with fries.  She also makes her living in agriculture.  Since she was a little girl, she helped her parents work in the field.  She sows beans, peas, spinach, potatoes, corn, and everything that their land can produce.  With time and the experience she has, she managed to adapt well to the market and rented more cropland.  With this she can sow in greater quantity therefore getting a greater income and meeting her basic needs.  Now she would like to buy her own cropland.  One of her goals is to expand her production and open a restaurant.  She knows that with work and dedication, she will be able to achieve this. 

She is part of the communal bank “La union hace la fuerza” and this is the 7th loan that she has with MFP.  She is very happy to be part of this communal bank and to have supportive partners.  Nery will invest the money in the purchase of organic fertilizer to start sowing peas and spinach.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 45 years old and married with six children.

Analiza works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 18,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell.

Analiza has borrowed and repaid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Analiza aspires to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela tiene 42 años, tiene tres hijas. Junto a su esposo y ellas, viven en su casa propia, la que construyeron con el trabajo de ambos por varios años. 
Desde los 18 años se dedica a las labores agrícolas; siembra papas de distintas variedades como “Yungay”, “Perricholi”, “Canchán”, “Tomasa” y otras de gran demanda. Los suelos fértiles de su zona le permiten obtener frutos de calidad. “El sabor de la papa de mi zona es especial, por eso siempre vendo mis productos cada vez que voy al mercado”, menciona. Además, hace 5 años decidió salir fuera de su ciudad y llevar sus productos hacia las ciudades costeras. Ahí sus productos tienen muy buena aceptación como semilla. A veces su cosecha no es suficiente para los compradores, por eso tiene que comprar varios sacos de papa a otros agricultores. De esa manera trabaja en armonía con su pareja para el bienestar de su familia.
